title: Factors influencing U.S. consumers ' foods and beverages purchases 2012 to 2016
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 5 lines denoting Taste, Price, Healthfulness, Convenience, and Sustainability. The y axis indicates the Has a great impact and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Sustainability is gradually increasing, Taste, Price, Healthfulness, and Convenience are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Taste mostly maintained the highest Has a great impact when compared to others with a mean value of 86.6, and it peaked at 2014.
Followed by Price which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 71.2 Has a great impact,reaching its highest point  at 2012 with a value of 73.0.
Sustainability mostly had the least Has a great impact with a mean value of 37.0, which peaked at 2016 with a value of 41.0.
